title: RPG Short Music Cues
description: 120 Small Orchestral Pieces / 4~25 sec. each /  19 minutes of Music
longDescription:
HIGH QUALITY ORCHESTRAL MUSIC FEATURING LIVE MUSICIANS!


The "RPG Short Music Cues" collection containing 120 Small Orchestral Soundtracks in a 7 different categories:

->PREVIEW<-


  1. EXCITING FANFARES (15) — victory, win...​
  2. EXPLORATION (15) — beautiful & grand, dark & ominous...​
  3. FAIRY & MAGICAL (15) — comedy, light, funky...​
  4. HEROIC & COMBAT (15) — epic & dramatic...​
  5. PERCUSSIVE RHYTHMS (15 ) — tribal, powerful...​
  6. SAD & DESPAIR (15) — loose, defeat...​
  7. CHORD HITS (30) — minor+major variations...

Each cue 4~25 sec. length (19 minutes of audio - from calm and peaceful to epic battle).

Best in context of: dark fantasy, mmo rpg, adventure, battle, d&d transitions, game themes, epic, village, town, castle, tavern, inn, medieval, tribal, ancient temple and similar stuff...


Anyway it can be used in any video game genre, LITERALLY from a generic Puzzle Game to an AAA Game or Cinematic Trailer... 

It's not limited by any means! :)


========================

⚠️YOUTUBE-SAFE MUSIC⚠️

========================

The music is cleared with YouTube and can be freely used without any concerns of copyright strikes, flags, or demonetization. This is essential if you expect players to showcase your game in videos or streams!

(i.e. you will never get a copyright claim and ALSO you are allowed to use the soundtracks wherever you want and as many times as you need)

It means Unlimited Royalty-Free license! Use the music over and over, in any of your project or productions, without any additional fees or royalties.


=================

PRODUCT SUPPORT

=================

in case you are experiencing any kind of issues (while using my assets), please feel free to contact me directly at any time so I can help you out as quick as possible.

⚠️If you need just the *wav files — contact me after purchase⚠️


===================================================

  • 120 high-quality *WAV tracks (16-bit; 1411 kb/s; 44.1 kHz)
  • 19 minutes of small orchestral clips
  • Wide variety of musical colors and emotions
  • 160mb of data
  • YouTube-Safe music tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license
  • Loopable: NO
